summary: An ordinance relating to zoning and providing for the rezoning of Lots 26 and 27, Block 29, Capitol Hill Addition, Division No. 4, located on the east side of 15th Avenue North 40 feet south of East Galer Street, with respect to Use and Area Districts, and amending Ordinance No. 45382, as amended, by adding tricts, and amending Ordinance No. 45382, as amended, by adding thereto two new sections numbered 2-80 and 17-51, respectively.
